attributes.review: I downloaded this app when I was hungry for some delicious nutritious carrots 🥕😋 but then I ended up with some disgusting unhealthy Cheetos and the dust, don’t even get me started on it 🤮🤮🤮!!! It was EVERYWHERE 🤢😡 and I couldn’t get rid of it. So annoying 😾🤬!!! Don’t download this app it is disgusting and smells and worst of all doesn’t even make me 🌸✨🧚‍♀️ skinny 🧚‍♀️✨🌸
attributes.title: Had Cheeto Dust Everywhere

attributes.review: I expected a wonderful app for me to use for insight on what my president is doing, but all I got was disappointment. The app kept blowing my phone up with useless and unnecessary messages, notifications, and emails. I would most definitely not recommend it, the app is an extreme let down!
attributes.title: utterly disappointed

attributes.review: I have so many complaints. I do not recommend this app to anyone even if it was the end of the world. Spend your storage on another app that is worthy. This Is Not worth your time. I was in the bathroom and i was sliding through my apps and seen this scary, horrifying, disgusting app 😔.
attributes.title: Not even 1 star worthy!, Should be 0 stars! Booooooooooo

attributes.review: Horrible horrible app when I first went to open it, it greeted me with old naked men flipping me off. 🤢😭 next i went to look around and while I was just scrolling through it somehow it threatens me I got rid of is but then that second my car got on fire 🔥😟 then it killed me parents. I definitely recommend it.... SIKE
attributes.title: It’s a double d (DD) DISGUSTING, doodoo

attributes.review: The app was bad and it was super complicated making an account. I kept getting random messages once I put my phone number in. Once I figured it out the app it self didn’t help clear up my confusion on our presidents thoughts and actions. would not recommended this app to anyone 🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app in hopes of creating a close bond with my beloved President Bunker Boy, but this was not the case😔. I was informed that wearing his ugly merch and hanging an American flag on my wall was NOT enough to be noticed by my fav. I’ve made the difficult decision to unstan. I’m writing this review in hopes that no one else has to suffer the way I did.
attributes.title: Fake News😔

attributes.review: our president should not be promoting his campaign through an app that is disgraceful to our country, it is already horrifying that he tweets out everything rather than being responsible and releasing things well. this president cannot serve another term, he has created chaos in our world he is a racist misogynistic president and i do not want to keep living in a country that he is president of. there are 5 year olds that are more responsible, kind, considerate, understanding, and inclusive than this man and i am ashamed to have him as our president
attributes.title: please take this app down

attributes.review:
I worship our almighty President, Donald Cheeto Trumpet. So when I heard he had an app, I downloaded it immediately. I used it for a while, but had delete it due to low storage. Ever since, my sleep paralysis demon has been Trump screaming Make America Great Again. I don’t know how to stop it. Don’t download. Very dangerous.

Trump 2020🌈❤️🌸 but on a gravestone 🧚‍♀️💋✨🙈
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review:
I am excited to use this app to follow our great President Trump and be a part of his strong 2020 campaign. Thank you Mr. President for creating this easy to use app.
#TRUMP2020
attributes.title: So Excited!!!

attributes.review: Honestly, downloaded this app to keep up with the campaign, turns out they are tracking your location and asking for a lot of money and donations, its annoying and a huge invasion of privacy, would give it zero stars if possible 🤮
attributes.title: Why is it so expensive?
